Elements defined in Ancestors:identifyingCode[x], classification, productName, marketingAuthorisationHolder, doseForm, packSize, item, device, characteristic, batch
Medicinal product model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference

description.value: Obligations for the logical model for medication.

short.value: Medicinal product model

definition.value: Logical model for prescribed/dispensed medication. The model is shared by statements, requests, dispensations, and treatment lines. Each of those may have different restrictions in FHIR profile.

short.value: Identifier or code for the product (virtual product, branded product or package). If several identifiers are specified, they shall not have conflicting meanings or very different granularities.

definition.value: Identifier or code for the product (virtual product, branded product or package). If several identifiers are specified, they shall not have conflicting meanings or very different granularities.

short.value: Classification (e.g. ATC; narcotic/psychotropic; orphan drug; etc.)

definition.value: Classification (e.g. ATC; narcotic/psychotropic; orphan drug; etc.)

short.value: Name of the product (full name, invented name, other). When the product has different names, the appropriate one for the context should be used. Translations of names can be provided.

definition.value: Name of the product (full name, invented name, other). When the product has different names, the appropriate one for the context should be used. Translations of names can be provided.

short.value: Marketing authorisation holder or manufacturer of the medicinal product. Relevant for identifying the exact product.

definition.value: Marketing authorisation holder or manufacturer of the medicinal product. Relevant for identifying the exact product.

short.value: Name of the organisation holding the authorisation for marketing/mahufacturing

definition.value: Name of the organisation holding the authorisation for marketing/mahufacturing

short.value: Identifier of the organisation and/or its physical location

definition.value: Identifier of the organisation and/or its physical location

short.value: Dose form(s) on a product level. Dose form for a single package item is defined below.

definition.value: Dose form(s) on a product level. Dose form for a single package item is defined below.

short.value: Overall amount of product in one package (100ml; 20 tablets; 1 creme & 6 pessaries)

definition.value: Overall amount of product in one package (100ml; 20 tablets; 1 creme & 6 pessaries)

description.value: UCUM for units of measure. EDQM Standard Terms for units of presentation.

short.value: A medication item. For combination packs, this can be manufactured items with each item having its own dose form and ingredients+strengths defined

definition.value: A medication item. For combination packs, this can be manufactured items with each item having its own dose form and ingredients+strengths defined

comment.value: Structure changed, elements repeated for complex packages

short.value: Dose form

definition.value: Dose form

short.value: Marks if the ingredient is considered an active ingredient. Typically excipients are not needed, so by default active ingredients are expected.

definition.value: Marks if the ingredient is considered an active ingredient. Typically excipients are not needed, so by default active ingredients are expected.

short.value: Strength of the product - amount of substance per unit

definition.value: Strength of the product - amount of substance per unit

short.value: Concentration or presentation strength, e.g 100mg/1ml or 500mg per 1 tablet

definition.value: Concentration or presentation strength, e.g 100mg/1ml or 500mg per 1 tablet

short.value: Substance that the strength refers to, in case it's different from the main substance

definition.value: Substance that the strength refers to, in case it's different from the main substance

comment.value: Added (eHN guidelines A.1.4.4.1 'in addition reference strength could be provided')

short.value: Unit of presentation for the manufactured item (tablet, vial, tube). Typically, the smallest countable object in the package.

definition.value: Unit of presentation for the manufactured item (tablet, vial, tube). Typically, the smallest countable object in the package.

short.value: Manufactured item quantity for liquids (3ml / 1 vial)

definition.value: Manufactured item quantity for liquids (3ml / 1 vial)

comment.value: Added (eHN guidelines A.1.4.9 mention layered structure for describing a package)

short.value: Number of such manufactured items in this product (5 vials)

definition.value: Number of such manufactured items in this product (5 vials)

comment.value: Added (eHN guidelines A.1.4.9 mention layered structure for describing a package)

description.value: UCUM for units of measure. EDQM Standard Terms for units of presentation.

short.value: Type of package of the medication item

definition.value: Type of package of the medication item

short.value: Administration device included in the product

definition.value: Administration device included in the product

short.value: Number of such devices

definition.value: Number of such devices

short.value: Device coded

definition.value: Device coded

short.value: Other features of the product

definition.value: Other features of the product

short.value: A code expressing the type of characteristic

definition.value: A code expressing the type of characteristic

short.value: Description of the characteristic

definition.value: Description of the characteristic

short.value: Batch information of a medicinal product. Typically recorded during dispense or administration, rarely known or relevant for a prescription/request.

definition.value: Batch information of a medicinal product. Typically recorded during dispense or administration, rarely known or relevant for a prescription/request.

short.value: Batch identifier of the medicinal product

definition.value: Batch identifier of the medicinal product

short.value: Batch expiration date of the medicinal product.

definition.value: Batch expiration date of the medicinal product.
